## TIX.getBidPrice() method

Returns the bid price of that stock.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getBidPrice(sym: string): number;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type   | Description   |
| --------- | ------ | ------------- |
| sym       | string | Stock symbol. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The bid price of a stock.
